name: 黃如瑩
objective: The purpose of this course is to create a context for our students to clearly express themselves and to effectively communicate with others in English with conscious efforts and by repeated practice.
schedule:
Syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction
Theme One: Let's practice English dubbing
of animated picture books
Week 2: Drill One
Week 3: Drill Two
Week 4: Drill Three 
Week 5:  Field trip
Theme Two: Let's practice Reader's Theater
Week 6: Script One
Week 7: Script Two
Week 8:  Script Three
Week 9 (Mid-term exam week): midterm group presentations
Week 10: Field trip
Theme Three: Let's practice famous dialogues
drawn from English drama
Week 11: Dialogue One
Week 12: Dialogue Two
Week 13: Dialogue Three
Week 14: Field trip
Theme Four: Let's put on a short play
Week 15: Practicum One
Week 16: Practicum Two
Week 17: Practicum Three
Week 18 (Final examination week): Final group presentations
scorePolicy:
I. Weekly performance in classroom participation and dialogue presentation: 60%
II. Midterm group presentations: 20%
III. Final group presentation: 20%
materials:
1. Good Chats (3rd edition),by Sandsberry, Sorenson, and Ring. Taipei: Bookman, 2008.
2. Essential Idioms in English (New Edition), by Dixson. New York: Pearson Education, 1994.
3. Dictionary of Idioms, by Terban.  New York:  Scholastic, 1996.
4.Idioms Made Easy:  Stories of Selected English Idioms. By Tseng and Kao. Taipei: Bookman, 2004.
